title: The Arch-bishop of Canterburie his speech, or, His funeral sermon  preached by himself on the scaffold on Tower-hill on Friday the tenth of January, 1645, upon Hebrews 12, 1, 2 also, the prayers which he used at the same time and place before his execution / all faithfully written by Iohn Hinde, whom the archbishop beseeched that hee would not let any wrong be done him by any phrase in false copies.
author: Laud, William, 1573-1645.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed with license and entred according to order,
